1007910.name: Coloring Pixels - Patterns Pack
1007910.description:
Patterns Book

This pattern themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! Inspired by optical illusions and colorful patterns.

Contents

The Pattern book unlocks the following images:
  • Honeycomb - 50x50
  • Spinning - 50x50
  • Cubes - 52x50
  • Circles - 75x75
  • Geometric Fractal - 81x81
  • Rug - 88x88
  • Metal Tiles - 96x096
  • Sand - 96x96
  • Color Illusion - 100x30
  • Corners - 100x100
  • Scales - 100x100
  • Spiral - 101x101
  • Beneath - 120x120
  • Dot Illusion - 120x120
  • Rainbow Weave - 142x142
  • Line Illusion - 150x99
  • Colorful Fractal - 150x150
  • Jigsaw - 220x220
  • Kaleidoscope - 256x256
  • Stars - 352x324
